title: Unix Time to DTL Time Converter
name: LGF_UnixTimeToDTL
description: This function converts the Unix time of data type DInt to a date and time of data type DTL. The timestamp is calculated in UTC.

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification

return_value.description: Converted time (Date and time). In case of Error: 0 (error = true)
